All functions

ghost_cluster()

Helper function to create potential ghost hostel clusters

ghost_combine()

Helper function to create potential intersection combinations

ghost_empty()

Helper function to output an empty ghost hostel table

ghost_identify_leftovers()

Helper function to identify leftover ghost hostel candidates

ghost_intersect()

Helper function to find ghost hostel locations

ghost_intersect_leftovers()

Helper function to rerun analysis on leftover ghost hostel candidates

ghost_intersect_with_done()

Helper function to intersect two buffers

ghost_stepwise_intersect()

Helper function to intersect a data frame of buffers

helper_plan()

Helper function to characterize future plan

helper_progress()

Helper function to display furrr progress bars

helper_progress_message()

Helper function to display a progress message

helper_table_split()

Helper function to split data for parallel processing

helper_test_field()

Helper function to test for a field

raffle_integrate()

Helper function to integrate raffle_PDF over intersect polygons

raffle_pdf()

Helper function specifying the probability density function

strr_FREH()

Function to identify frequently rented entire-home (FREH) listings

strr_as_sf()

Function to convert property tables to sf objects

strr_compress()

Function to compress daily STR tables into UPGo DB format

strr_compress_helper()

Helper function to compress daily file

strr_compress_helper_host()

Helper function to compress host file

strr_expand()

Function to expand compressed STR tables

strr_ghost()

Function to identify STR ghost hostels

strr_host()

Function to create daily host activity tables

strr_housing()

Function to identify STRs located in housing

strr_principal_res()

Function to identify STR listings which are likely to be principal residences

strr_process_daily()

Function to process raw daily STR tables into UPGo format

strr_process_property()

Function to process raw property STR tables into UPGo format

strr_raffle()

Raffle to assign STR listings to administrative units for spatial analysis
